verses.verse: Why do you <S%H5975>stand<s%> far <S%H7350>off,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh?<s%> Why do you <S%H5956>hide<s%> yourself in <S%H6256>times<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble?<s%>
In <S%H1346>arrogance,<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1814>hunt<s%> down the <S%H6041>weak.<s%> They are <S%H8610>caught<s%> in the <S%H4209>schemes<s%> <S%H2098>that<s%> they <S%H2803>devise.<s%>
For the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1984>boasts<s%> of his <S%H5315>heart<s%>'s <S%H8378>cravings.<s%> He <S%H1288>blesses<s%> the <S%H1214>greedy,<s%> and <S%H5006>condemns<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> in the <S%H1363>pride<s%> of his <S%H639>face,<s%> has no <S%H1875>room<s%> in his <S%H4209>thoughts<s%> for <S%H430>God.<s%>

His <S%H1870>ways<s%> are <S%H2342>prosperous<s%> at all <S%H6256>times.<s%> He is <S%H4941>haughty,<s%> and your laws are far <S%H4791>from<s%> his <S%H6887>sight.<s%> As for all his adversaries, he sneers at <S%H6315>them.<s%>
He <S%H559>says<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> "I shall not be <S%H4131>shaken.<s%> For <S%H1755>generations<s%> I shall have no <S%H7451>trouble.<s%>"
His <S%H6310>mouth<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H423>cursing,<s%> <S%H4820>deceit,<s%> and <S%H8496>oppression.<s%> Under his <S%H3956>tongue<s%> is <S%H5999>mischief<s%> and <S%H205>iniquity.<s%>

He <S%H3427>lies<s%> in wait <S%H3993>near<s%> the <S%H2691>villages.<s%> From <S%H4565>ambushes,<s%> he <S%H2026>murders<s%> the <S%H5355>innocent.<s%> His <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are secretly <S%H6845>set<s%> against the <S%H2489>helpless.<s%>

He <S%H693>lurks<s%> in <S%H4565>secret<s%> as a <S%H738>lion<s%> in his <S%H5520>ambush.<s%> He lies in <S%H693>wait<s%> to <S%H2414>catch<s%> the <S%H6041>helpless.<s%> He <S%H2414>catches<s%> the <S%H6041>helpless,<s%> when he <S%H4900>draws<s%> him in his <S%H7568>net.<s%>
The <S%H2489>helpless<s%> are <S%H1794>crushed.<s%> They <S%H7817>collapse.<s%> They <S%H5307>fall<s%> under his <S%H6099>strength.<s%>
He <S%H559>says<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H410>"God<s%> has <S%H7911>forgotten.<s%> He <S%H5641>hides<s%> his <S%H6440>face.<s%> He will <S%H5331>never<s%> see <S%H7200>it.<s%>"
Why does the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> person <S%H5006>condemn<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> "God <S%H1875>won't<s%> call me into account?"

But you <S%H7200>do<s%> <S%H5027>see<s%> <S%H5999>trouble<s%> and <S%H3708>grief.<s%> You <S%H5414>consider<s%> it to <S%H5800>take<s%> it into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%> You <S%H5826>help<s%> the <S%H2489>victim<s%> and the <S%H3490>fatherless.<s%>
<S%H7665>Break<s%> the <S%H2220>arm<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%> As for the <S%H7563>evil<s%> <S%H1875>man,<s%> seek out his <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> until you <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H1077>none.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H5703>forever<s%> and <S%H5769>ever!<s%> The <S%H1471>nations<s%> will <S%H6>perish<s%> out of his <S%H776>land.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> you have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H8378>desire<s%> of the <S%H6035>humble.<s%> You will <S%H3559>prepare<s%> their <S%H3820>heart.<s%> You will cause your <S%H241>ear<s%> to <S%H7181>hear,<s%>
to <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> and the <S%H1790>oppressed,<s%> that <S%H582>man<s%> who is of the <S%H776>earth<s%> may <S%H6206>terrify<s%> no <S%H3254>more.<s%>
